title: The Perfect Getaway
description:
Between work and kids, most of us struggle to make time for ourselves. My friend Lindsey DeMith joins me in a talk about planning the perfect getaway because we all need time away from our daily lives.

On Thursdays, I will be doing a bonus episode where my friends and I will discuss some of our own personal discoveries and opinions on beauty, health and wellness.

And I also want to hear from you. Share some of your aha moments on beauty, health and wellness, and have a discussion. If you're on Apple podcasts, write your aha moment in the comment section. Or you can email me at beautyuncovered@olaplex.com. And maybe you could be chosen to be a guest on our Thursday discussion panel.
